products.title: Burst Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The dark, dulcet tones of the burst brownie are a work of art, filling the room with that warm, rich energy for which it is named. With the sun behind it, this blind will fill the room with a gorgeous yet restrained brown glow that will make you feel like you are stepping into a bath of melted milk chocolate. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless Brown
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless Latte
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Burnt Brown Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The burnt brown colour on this aluminium venetian blind is great for those looking for something to add some warmth to their home decor. This brown is not too dark and moody that it detracts from the rest of your home, but instead adds a richness and warmth to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Woodland Brown Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Amor Brownie Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, deep brown colour of the amor brownie is great for any room in the home. The bold, solid colour is sure to stand out no matter what the decor - and the water resistant and blackout properties makes it suitable for home and office. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Amor Coffee Vertical Blind
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Amor Coffee With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor coffee with haze pure double roller blind combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor pure and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds.

products.title: Soho Brown Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Enjoy a classic tone in your window with the soho brown pleated dimout perfect fit. The rich brown of this blind is an ideal match for retro furnishings made from dark wood, such as mahogany and walnut. The fabric itself is not a dull one-tone, but is instead built up from overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and vivid colour. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, further enlivening this exciting blind.

products.title: Amor Coffee With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Lower the voile fabric to give your home the daytime privacy you require. Gently filtering the light and preventing people from seeing in, this blind is ideal for those who don't want to be overlooked. Amor coffee with haze soft grey double roller blind.

products.title: Real Wood Rich Coffee Bean Perfect Fit
products.description: The rich coffee bean perfect fit is a rich chocolate colour and is one of the darkest woods in their range. This blind works well in any decor due to its warm and soft nature, pairing well with mahogany furnishings. As with all their real wood perfect fits, a matching real wood venetian blind is available for a coordinated finish. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Latte Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A cool khaki tone with a high-beam shine, latte gloss ideal for more rustic environments with a lot of neutral woodgrain or fabric furnishings. Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows such as inward-opening styles struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.
